subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Defensive tackle Nick Fairley, Auburn’s other big-name star, also is heading to the N.F.L. after winning the Lombardi Award and helping Cam Newton lead the Tigers to a national title.
snippet: Defensive tackle Nick Fairley, Auburn’s other big-name star, also is heading to the N.F.L. after winning the Lombardi Award and helping Cam Newton lead the Tigers to a national title.
